issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The lack of an ORDER BY clause on a query in GrantRevokeDDLTest.getGrantRevokeDDL can give rise to errors like the following (seen in test run http://javadb.se.oracle.com/javadb-testing/request_5586034/javadb-task-3781856.html):

    junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Column value mismatch @ column 'SCHEMANAME', row 4:
    Expected: >SATHEESH<
    Found:    >TEST_DBO<
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.JDBC.assertRowInResultSet(JDBC.java:1291)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.JDBC.assertRowInResultSet(JDBC.java:1203)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.JDBC.assertFullResultSetMinion(JDBC.java:1090)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.JDBC.assertFullResultSet(JDBC.java:1013)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.JDBC.assertFullResultSet(JDBC.java:970)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang.GrantRevokeDDLTest.testGrantRevokeDDL(GrantRevokeDDLTest.java:451)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseTestCase.runBare(BaseTestCase.java:118)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseJDBCTestCase.runBareOverridable(BaseJDBCTestCase.java:440)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseJDBCTestCase.runBare(BaseJDBCTestCase.java:457)
	at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:24)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:21)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:25)
	at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:24)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:21)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:25)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseTestSetup.run(BaseTestSetup.java:57)
	at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:24)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:21)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:25)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseTestSetup.run(BaseTestSetup.java:57)
	at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:24)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:21)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:25)
	at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:24)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:21)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:25)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseTestSetup.run(BaseTestSetup.java:57)
	at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:24)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:21)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:25)
	at org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseTestSetup.run(BaseTestSetup.java:57)
	at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:24)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:21)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:25)
	at junit.extensions.TestDecorator.basicRun(TestDecorator.java:24)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:21)
	at junit.extensions.TestSetup.run(TestSetup.java:25)

comments.body:
Attaching derby-6441-01-addOrderByClauses.diff. This patch adds ORDER BY clauses to a number of queries in GrantRevokeDDLTest in order to force deterministic results.

Touches the following file:

M       java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/tests/lang/GrantRevokeDDLTest.java

author.name: jira-bot
author.emailAddress: no-reply at urd dot zones dot apache dot org

comments.body:
Commit 1553280 from [~rhillegas] in branch 'code/trunk'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1553280 ]

DERBY-6441: Add ORDER BY clauses to a number of queries in GrantRevokeDDLTest in order to force deterministic results; checks in derby-6441-01-addOrderByClauses.diff.
